net.alomax.io

Class ZipStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alomax.io.ZipStream

  • public class ZipStream
extends java.lang.Object
    open a buffered input stream use GZIPInputStream or ZipInputStream if extension is .gz or .zip
